title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + How to do a story using social network analysis
description: A guide on how to create a story using social network analysis, focusing on selecting a group of people, defining networks, using a social network analysis program, visualizing networks, and interpreting calculations.
